channel.title: RelentlessPK
channel.description:
JOIN NOW FOR FREE DONATOR STATUS AND 15 DONATOR POINTS, ALSO LOOKING FOR HELPERS.
[center] [b][SIZE="7"][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vwb4g1.png[/img][/SIZE][/b] [i]Clearly the Best.[/i]
[COLOR="Lime"]Scroll to the bottom for Pictures.[/COLOR]
[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69315098/Client.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69315098/Client.jar[/url]
[URL=http://"http://www.relentlesspk.net/vote"]vote for 500M! - Working![/URL]
[url=http://www.relentlesspk.net/Webclient.php]http://www.relentlesspk.net/Webclient.php[/url]
[url=http://www.relentlesspk.net/Client.jar]http://www.relentlesspk.net/Client.jar[/url]
[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69315098/run.bat%20RelentlessPK.rar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69315098/run.bat%20RelentlessPK.rar[/url]
[url=http://www.relentlesspk.net]http://www.relentlesspk.net[/url]
[url=http://www.relentlesspk.net/vote]http://www.relentlesspk.net/vote[/url] (vote for 500m!)
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Red"]Server Features[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="SeaGreen"]VPS A pre made bank filled with over 150 items for pking. Corporeal beast. Torva. Virtus. Pernix. Special bone systems to loot bones and trade them in. Party hats in the shop but take a VERY long time to get. All Special Attacks Rewritten Combat Assistant Custom Items A rev cave located in the wilderness Weapon Poisoning All Magic Spells on normal book. Vengeance Curses Spell Book Unique Home Frost dragon system in which you kill dragons to earn points to buy chaotics. All Skills Working 100% Items Kept on Death 562+ Hit splats Fight Caves Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon Active Pk Zones Pk Shop with 'sets' like torva set. Slayer Tasks Chaotic Weapons Spirit Shields (Working Effects) Leach Prayers
[/COLOR] [SIZE="6"][COLOR="Red"]Skilling[/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="SeaGreen"]All Skills Working 100% Slayer Tasks All Herbs and Plants Cutting Gems - Crafting NPC Pick pocketing - Thieving Stalls - Thieving Great XP Rates Agility Obsticals Correct Herblore Animations All logs able to Light - Fire making Cooking, With Correct Burning Methods All foods Cook Able Harpoon Fishing Big Net Fishing All Fish Catch Able All Bars Smelt Able All bones are able to be Buried Correct Altar Animations [/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2dhioba.png[/img] Melee & Combat Skills All Bows and Arrows Re-Written Combat System 562+ Hit splats Weapon Poisoning All Special Attacks Perfect Combat Assistant Perfected Item Bonuses Great Combos
[COLOR="Red"][SIZE="6"]About the Combat[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR="SeaGreen"]The combat of RelentlessPk has been totally rewritten, all combat bugs are fixed, and very rarely does it hit 5+ consecutive zero's. The perfect switching really does help with combat, There is also many other features that come along, such as Auto-Casting, and x10 Hits, All of the special attacks are added into the game, Aswell as overloads, This makes for great Pking, While we wrote combat, we also thaught about the weapon power, We are still working on this, but we want to make sure that all the weapons have correct, and not cheap bonuses[/COLOR][/center]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mop8qu.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/33njfgh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/wixcsg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/211m4ue.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ay7rpl.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/b5o0hs.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2iu534m.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/xqkxhj.png[/img]
EDIT: I am 'Boolean' From Rune-Server.

item.title: RelentlessPK
item.dc:creator: @relentlesspk.net relentlesspk.net
item.description:
@relentlesspk.net wrote:

JOIN NOW FOR FREE DONATOR STATUS AND 15 DONATOR POINTS, ALSO LOOKING FOR HELPERS.

[center]
[SIZE=“7”][/SIZE]
Clearly the Best.

[COLOR=“Lime”]Scroll to the bottom for Pictures.[/COLOR]

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69315098/Client.jar

vote for 500M! - Working!

http://www.relentlesspk.net/Webclient.php

http://www.relentlesspk.net/Client.jar

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69315098/run.bat%20RelentlessPK.rar

http://www.relentlesspk.net

http://www.relentlesspk.net/vote (vote for 500m!)

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Red”]Server Features[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR=“SeaGreen”]VPS
A pre made bank filled with over 150 items for pking.
Corporeal beast.
Torva.
Virtus.
Pernix.
Special bone systems to loot bones and trade them in.
Party hats in the shop but take a VERY long time to get.
All Special Attacks
Rewritten Combat Assistant
Custom Items
A rev cave located in the wilderness
Weapon Poisoning
All Magic Spells on normal book.
Vengeance
Curses Spell Book
Unique Home
Frost dragon system in which you kill dragons to earn points to buy chaotics.
All Skills Working 100%
Items Kept on Death
562+ Hit splats
Fight Caves
Chaos Elemental
King Black Dragon
Active Pk Zones
Pk Shop with ‘sets’ like torva set.
Slayer Tasks
Chaotic Weapons
Spirit Shields (Working Effects)
Leach Prayers

[/COLOR]
[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Red”]Skilling[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR=“SeaGreen”]All Skills Working 100%
Slayer Tasks
All Herbs and Plants
Cutting Gems - Crafting
NPC Pick pocketing - Thieving
Stalls - Thieving
Great XP Rates
Agility Obsticals
Correct Herblore Animations
All logs able to Light - Fire making
Cooking, With Correct Burning Methods
All foods Cook Able
Harpoon Fishing
Big Net Fishing
All Fish Catch Able
All Bars Smelt Able
All bones are able to be Buried
Correct Altar Animations [/COLOR]


Melee & Combat Skills
All Bows and Arrows
Re-Written Combat System
562+ Hit splats
Weapon Poisoning
All Special Attacks
Perfect Combat Assistant
Perfected Item Bonuses
Great Combos

[COLOR=“Red”][SIZE=“6”]About the Combat[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=“SeaGreen”]The combat of RelentlessPk has been totally rewritten, all combat bugs are fixed, and very rarely does it hit 5+ consecutive zero’s.
The perfect switching really does help with combat, There is also many other features that come along, such as Auto-Casting, and x10 Hits,
All of the special attacks are added into the game, Aswell as overloads, This makes for great
Pking, While we wrote combat, we also thaught about the weapon power,
We are still working on this, but we want to make sure that all the weapons have correct, and not cheap bonuses[/COLOR][/center]
